Pre-Game Insights: Chhetri emphasized the importance of winning the match to qualify for the third round, which India has never achieved before. He also highlighted the significance of playing in Kolkata with strong fan support.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcasted on Sports 18 1, Sports 18 1 HD, Sports 18 3, and streamed live on JioCinema.
Others: The match is on June 6, 2024, at 19:00 IST.
